title: Field safety notices - 22 to 26 June 2015

details.body:
Overview

If you receive a field safety notice (FSN) from a manufacturer you must always act on it.

MHRA publishes the following for information only.

If you have a question about a particular FSN contact the manufacturer.

Latest FSNs

View the latest FSNs

Agfa HealthCare: AGFA digital radiography X-ray system DX-D 100

PR1501190003 PR1411200006PR1406020002

X-ray, digital acquisition systems

Model: DX-D 100 mobile wireless DR

MHRA reference: 2015/006/008/291/004

AuraFibers

Therapy, lasers

Model: various models

SureFlexReusableFibers

Medtronic MiniMed: Medtronic MiniMed 640G insulin pump
